p: Nevertheless, various papers [ 11, 15, 16, 17] report on the enrichment of EVOO in order to improve its nutritional value and to ameliorate its chemical stability. For example, EVOO samples, added with oregano essential oil, showed improved stability in different conditions (darkness, light exposure, and 60 °C), with respect to non-added EVOO [ 15]. The addition of the essential oil of Zataria multiflora (Shirazi thyme) reduced the EVOO oxidation to the same extent as BHT, and more effectively than α-tocopherol [ 11]. Recently, some researchers observed that EVOO can be preserved against oxidation using sesame seed oil during storage [ 16].
